title: A British woman discovering a 12-year-old Afghan baby is a 21-year-old jihadi?
subtitle: According to a British newspaper, a mother discovered that her 12-year-old Afghan foster child was an adult terrorist but did not provide proof of the story.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: A 12-year-old Afghan adopted child in the United Kingdom turned out to be a 21-year-old Jehadi.
